mapper.select: select r.reply_no, r.reply_content, r.board_no, r.reply_regdate, r.category_no, r.member_id, m.member_name from reply r, member m where r.member_id = m.member_id and r.board_no = #{boardNo} and r.category_no = #{categoryNo} order by r.reply_regdate
mapper.insert: insert into reply( reply_no, reply_content, board_no, category_no, member_id ) values ( seq_reply_reply_no.nextval, #{replyContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boardNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
